roleset.name: to bring or come together

example.name: transitive aggressive ballooning
example.text: We finally rendezvoused with our balloon , which had come to rest on a dirt road amid a clutch of Epinalers who watched us disassemble our craft -- another half - an - hour of non - flight activity -- that included the precision routine of yanking the balloon to the ground , punching all the air out of it , rolling it up and cramming it and the basket into the trailer .

propbank.arg: with our balloon , which had come to rest on a dirt road amid a clutch of Epinalers who watched us disassemble our craft -- another half - an - hour of non - flight activity -- that included the precision routine of yanking the balloon to the ground , punching all the air out of it , rolling it up and cramming it and the basket into the trailer

roleset.note: RENDEZVOUS-V NOTES: Member of VNcls correspond-36.1. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from rendezvous.01-v)
